labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

title: Revert "Add frunk support for swagger::Nullable"
body: This reverts https://github.com/Metaswitch/swagger-rs/pull/115 which caused problems due to https://github.com/lloydmeta/frunk/issues/143 by merging forward https://github.com/Metaswitch/swagger-rs/pull/116

title: Revert "Add frunk support for swagger::Nullable"
body:
This reverts commit 92f6f85ff13c1b10b4621c2d6a6fcdfd6d98cfef.

This reverts https://github.com/Metaswitch/swagger-rs/pull/114 which caused problems due to https://github.com/lloydmeta/frunk/issues/143

title: Merge #114 to master
body:
Forward merge of 114: Add frunk support for swagger::Nullable r=richardwhiuk a=richardwhiuk

Currently if a OpenAPI model includes a nullable field, we can't use frunk to transmogrify it into a identical structure using `swagger::Nullable`

Co-authored-by: Richard Whitehouse <richard.whitehouse@metaswitch.com>

Cherry-picked from 36f5300d9b9216946a58cf5b01730f18bc151f2e.

title: Add frunk support for swagger::Nullable
body: Currently if a OpenAPI model includes a nullable field, we can't use frunk to transmogrify it into a identical structure using `swagger::Nullable`

title: Introduce OneOf and AnyOf types
body: This merges into master - previously merged into v3 branch.

title: Hyper 0.13 support
body:
- Update dependencies
  - hyper 0.13
  - base64 0.11
  - uuid 0.8
  - futures 0.3
  - hyper-openssl 0.8
  - hyper-tls 0.4

- Change all `hyper::service::MakeServices` to `hyper::service::Service`

- Add helper method to convert a stream of Bytes (e.g. a `hyper::Body`) into a `Vec<u8>`, which is useful for the codegen crate.

- Remove `client::Service`, which is now just `hyper::service::Service`, removing the client module.

- Remove ability to configure DNS threads in HTTP Connector, as it's been removed from Hyper 0.13.

- Drop ContextualPayload, and revert to Hyper 0.11 style tuples for Context.

title: Ensure futures are Send and 'static
body:
This is needed implicitly all over the place in hyper-land (and really in any async land where a future might not be pinned to a thread).

Also, takes advantage of `futures::future::BoxFuture` which is pretty much exactly what you had before only it's `+ Send` and has a space to write that it's `'static` explictly.

title: Don't panic in X-Span-ID handling of non-ASCII characters
body: Currently services using the `AddContextService` will panic in a request is made with an X-Span-ID header with non-ASCII characters due to an `unwrap`. This change will instead create a new span ID in this scenario.

title: Use hyper-tls 0.3 instead
body: hyper-tls 0.4 is compatible with Hyper 0.13, not Hyper 0.12

title: Re-instate accidentally removed test and fix follow-on issues
body: Whoops, accidentally commented out the doctest in #97.  Re-instate it and tighten it up to find a few straggling issues.

title: Make DropContextService a client middleware too
body: Since client middle-ware might need contexts too, this simply add a symmetric implementation of `swagger::client::Service` to the `DropContextService` middle-ware.

title: Make context macros self-contained
body: With this, the various `make_context_X` macros never reference names from the local crate without fully qualifying them.  Without this, users of the macros would have to `use` various swagger traits/macros (or `#[macro_use]` the crate).

title: Update swagger-rs to Rust 2018 Edition
body:
This updates swagger-rs to Rust 2018 edition.

This means we need Rust 1.31 to build - but given we don't have a policy other than "Builds on stable Rust", I don't think this constitutes an API break.

title: Handle Hyper 0.11's Headers implementation
Use hyper-openssl instead of hyper-tls
body:
Fixes #66 and #43

We move to hyper-openssl on Linux, so we can update OpenSSL, and maintain support for pinning certificates and mutual TLS.

We stick with hyper-tls and native-tls on non-Linux platforms, but don't support that feature (as it's not supported in native-tls in the same fashion).

title: Add useful macros for merging request parsers
body: As per https://github.com/Metaswitch/swagger-rs/pull/74 but for v3 / master.
